The Wolzhsky 24-year-old alfons were given 11 years for killing a 50-year-old friend.

Sergei Borodin♪08.02.2024 at 13:450
On 8 February, the Volga City Court sentenced a 24-year-old former Azerbaijani citizen. He was found guilty of murdering the wolf and stealing her gold jewels. This was reported by the press service of the Prosecutor ' s Office of the Volgograd Region. The trial was...

The fura with the driver burned, the beer kegs squeezed a " ten " : the tragedy took place on the track under Volgograd

In the Volgograd region, 32-year-old residents of the Krasnodar province and 24-year-old native of Irkut province were detained. They're suspected of online fraud. The Volge convoy recovered 200,000 roubles for the fall of the passenger.

Sergei Borodin♪06.02.2024 at 14:340
Volge Column No. 1732 will pay 200,000 roubles to compensate for the moral injury of the passenger who fell on the bus. This decision was made by the Volga City Court. According to the Wolzh's truth in the press service of the horizon, the incident occurred...

Sergei Borodin♪06.02.2024 at 12:470
The accident occurred on Monday, 5 February, on a new bridge across the Akhtub River near the town of the Voljsky in the Mid-Akhtubin region. Sergei Borodin♪06.02.2024 at 12:000

In the Wolzhsky, IP seized 17,000 packs of soft cigarettes.

Sergei Borodin♪05.02.2024 at 12:000
A large group of non-exhaustive cigarettes found police officers in the city of Volge. According to the " Volge Truth " in the press service of the Ministry of Internal Affairs in Volgograd oblast, a 50-year-old individual entrepreneur had seized almost 17.5 thousand packs of cigarettes without excise stamps.
